actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans

official_title: To amend the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to provide for a 3-year research plan to assess the status of stocks of fish that are managed under the Pacific Fisheries Management Council Pacific Coast Groundfish Plan, and for other purposes.
short_title: Private Vessel Fish Survey Act of 1995

summary.text: Private Vessel Fish Survey Act of 1995 - Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to establish a Pacific Region Scientific Review Group to develop a three-year research plan to assess the status of stocks of fish managed under the Pacific Fisheries Management Council Pacific Coast Groundfish Plan.

titles.title: Private Vessel Fish Survey Act of 1995

To amend the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to provide for a 3-year research plan to assess the status of stocks of fish that are managed under the Pacific Fisheries Management Council Pacific Coast Groundfish Plan, and for other purposes.
